title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Design Strategies for Improving Higher Education Laws Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Interpret learning analytics data to identify at least three strengths and areas for improvement in lesson design
Develop two data-driven instructional strategies to promote collaborative and self-directed learning
Design a personalized feedback system that reflects individual student characteristics (learning styles, progress, etc.).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
